page.title: 02CLUBS I
page.content:
Most of the clubs meet in Holywood Church Hall. These clubs are:-
{ Mother and Toddler Group { Friendship Club for Senior Citizens { Holywood Cubs { Holywood Sewing Group { Holywood Church Womans Guild { Holywood and District S.W.R.I. { Holywood Church Sunday Club for 10-15 { year olds The{Youth Club}has its own hall, which is also used by{Holywood Bowling Club. It is situated near the church. {The Ladies Keep Fit Class}meets weekly in Holywood School as did the {Holywood Bridge Club}before it moved to the Embassy Hotel, just outwith the area. It has now about 30 members playing once a week.
